entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
